DOC.brief_title: Kava Kava Treatment Generalized Anxiety Disorder ( GAD )
DOC.detailed_description: Kava kava ( KAV ) plant-derived treatment widely use Europe treat anxiety disorder . Several study suggest KAV may effective reduce anxiety symptom ; however , trial data limit . This study compare KAV , drug venlafaxine-XR ( VEN ) , placebo treatment GAD . This study last 10 week . Participants randomly assign receive KAV , VEN , placebo 8 week . Participants undergo 1-week taper medication follow additional week observation . Self-report scale questionnaire use assess anxiety , depression , functional impairment participant . Side effect , vital sign , laboratory measure monitor throughout study .
